headline: How The Progressive (PGR) Narrative Is Shifting As Fair Value And Analyst Views Recalibrate
summary: Progressive’s updated fair value estimate has shifted from US$248.98 to US$239.00, a reduction of roughly 4% that reframes how some investors may think about upside from here. This move sits alongside Street research that is adjusting price targets as analysts weigh premium growth, policy in force trends, investment income assumptions, and longer term risks, without fully changing their broader stance. As you read on, you will see how these evolving targets fit into the bigger Progressive...

headline: Progressive Announces Investor Relations Event
summary: MAYFIELD VILLAGE, OHIO, Feb. 24, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- As previously announced, The Progressive Corporation (NYSE: PGR) will host an Investor Relations event on Tuesday, March 3, 2026, beginning at 9:30 a.m. eastern time. This event, which will consist of both a conference call and webcast, is scheduled to last 90 minutes and will begin with an approximately 45-minute presentation on capital and investments, followed by a question-and-answer session with Tricia Griffith, our CEO, and John Sau

content.title: Progressive Announces Investor Relations Event
content.summary: MAYFIELD VILLAGE, OHIO, Feb. 24, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- As previously announced, The Progressive Corporation (NYSE: PGR) will host an Investor Relations event on Tuesday, March 3, 2026, beginning at 9:30 a.m. eastern time. This event, which will consist of both a conference call and webcast, is scheduled to last 90 minutes and will begin with an approximately 45-minute presentation on capital and investments, followed by a question-and-answer session with Tricia Griffith, our CEO, and John Sau
